about.name: Vashchuk Roman Yuriyovych
about.quote: I don't rush to explain myself.

description.observe: I observe more than I speak.
description.love: I love control, silence, and structure.

about.ending: Some are better understood without asking.

intro.text: There is no aim to impress here. Only an attempt to leave a trace in the silence.

home.about: I am an ordinary person who loves to grow, try new things, and create my own things. This site is not about a profession, it's about me: my interests, thoughts, and path.

observe.title: Observation
observe.text: I observe more than I explain.

order.title: Order
order.text: Things have their place and time.

depth.title: Depth
depth.text: The surface does not interest me.

intro.text: It's not about entertainment. It's about moments when nothing needs to be proven.

music.text: A backdrop for thoughts and silence. Sometimes on repeat, sometimes in the background.

books.title: üìñ Books
books.text: I don't read fast, but I read attentively. What matters is not how much, but what remains.

silence.title: üåô Silence
silence.text: A space without noise. That's where thoughts are born.
